modName: Erza Scarlet - Titania NPC Follower - BETA -
summary:
Add Erza Scarlet (Titania) as NPC follower / companion to Skyrim
  - Level 80 Follower
  - Location:  Whiterun: Banner Mare
  - Armor/Gear:  Daedric
  - 2H Combat Type
descriptionHtml:
This is a my feable attempt to adding Erza Scarlet, an S-class (level 80) Fairy Tail character, into Skyrim.  For those familiar with Fairy Tail, you know who she is ... I\'m not going to explain her background or Fairy Tail (goto: http://http://fairytail.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page if you are interested).   Erza can be found in Whiterun Banner Mare

TO INSTALL:   Extract the esp file from the archive, and place it in you Skyrim data directory. 

Requirement
============
You need the following for this mod to work:

   Tera Hair pack - http://www.loverslab.com/showthread.php?tid=4188&pid=99562#pid99562
   Extended Slider Colors - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923
   NOTE:  I used Extended Colors - Less Selection

Know issues and workarounds
===========================
1)  Erza does not found in Whiterun Banner Mare.   Simply find her ID via \'help erza 4\' in the command console, and then type \'player.placeatme <id>\'  - replace <id> with Erza\'s id reported back from the first help command.  She wears Daedric Armor Set by default and weld Daedric Greatsword. 

2) Erza face is complexion mismatch with body (dark greyish).   Goto to command console mode, select Erza, then type:   
    setnpcweight 0
    setnpcweight 100

3) Changing outfit or weapon .. simply goto command console mode, select Erza, and then type \'removeallitems\'  ... now you can give her any armor/clothes/weapon and she\'ll wear/use them.

VARIATION NOTICE
=================
I also use CBBBLE v2.1 and other mods to have her look the why she does in the image (see References for list of package you may want to consider).   Your version may look difference if you use different face, body, texture, hair, etc.   So, feel free to experiment.
